statements: DELETE FROM GenomicSequencingData WHERE patient_id = 100 AND chromosome_number = 23;
DELETE FROM GenomicSequencingData WHERE patient_id = 100 AND mutation_type = 'Insertion'
DELETE FROM GenomicSequencingData WHERE chromosome_number = 23 AND gene_name = 'BRCA1'
DELETE FROM patients WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM mutations WHERE mutation_position = 10 AND gene_name = 'ABC'
DELETE FROM mutations WHERE patient_id = 1 AND mutation_type = 'Substitution';
DELETE FROM mutations WHERE gene_name = 'BRCA1' AND mutation_type = 'Missense';
